publish_clean_reads.help_text: should the pre-processed reads be saved (gzip-compressed) in the preprocessing/ output folder.

publish_intermediate_reads.help_text: Enable publishing of intermediate reads from trimmomatic, and trf processes during pre-processing. Most read sets will be uncompressed fastq files.

run_trimmomatic.help_text: Run Trimmomatic for adapter removal and trimming for quality

adapter_fasta.help_text: Path to fasta file containing adapter sequences

trim_window_size.help_text: Sliding window size for read trimming

trim_baseq.help_text: Average base quality cutoff for the sliding window for trimmomatic

trim_min_length.help_text: Minimum read length retained following trimming

run_trf.help_text: Run TRF for finding and removing tandem repeat from short reads

publish_host_data.help_text: Publish the reads determined to originate from the host organism.

bmtagger_db.help_text: Path to directory containing BMTagger database.

bmtagger_host.help_text: Reference genome version used for host read filtering.
